item.description: Release Notes for v0.4.1 # New Features # Library Elements Connections # Added support for libraryelement connections. This option allows you to see what dashboards are using the given library. note: You won’t be able to delete the library element while there are dashboards utilizing it. Bugs: # FIXED: Addressing Login issue when Basic Auth is omitted. #144

Release Notes for v0.4.0 # This is a major change from the previous one, I’ll likely cut the 1.x soon and start following the more typical Semver conventions. Aka Major version is a breaking change, Minor is just that, patches for previous versions. Please see the API Changes notes below. New Features # Wild card flag # You can now set a flag under each context that will ignore Watched Folders and retrieve all dashboards.
